attributes.action: Close schools and universities for Covid-19 in the UK
attributes.additional_details: The government and parliament have the power to shut down all schools, colleges and universities. The government will have more of an effect on people and are far more listened to.
attributes.background: Close schools, colleges and universities in the UK in other to delay the spread of Covid-19.

rejection.details:
Since this petition was created, the Government has announced that schools and colleges are to close. It has also asked everyone to stay at home. You can find out more here: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus 

You can find out more about how to protect yourself and others from coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/
